title: release: ARMv6 packages missing for Go 1.6.3
body:
It appears that no packages were publishes for ARMv6 for Go 1.6.3. Checking the download page; https://golang.org/dl/, and https://storage.googleapis.com/golang, there are [packages for Go 1.6.2](https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.6.2.linux-armv6l.tar.gz), but not for 1.6.3

Are there plans to provide packages, or should we build from source?

Relates to https://github.com/docker/docker/pull/24811
